document_data.caption: A set of well-used, rusty chisels.
document_data.name: Chisel
document_data.value2e: {{Plain table|Wood chisel set (12), [[steel]]|12 [[gp]]|Stone chisel set (12), [[mithral]]|120 gp}}
document_data.mainbody: A '''chisel''' was a simple and useful tool found in the [[Realms]]. One particular variation of it was called a '''graver'''.
document_data.Description: A chisel resembled a metal rod with a [[knife]]-like wedge at one end, able to be driven into material with a [[hammer]]-blow.
document_data.Usage:
Chisels could be used in almost every trade that required material to be cut, etched, or chipped away, including metalworking,

A variation called '''tatami nomi''' was used by [[ninja]]s to chisel away the wood around [[lock]]s.{{Cite dragon/16/Ultimate NPC: Ninja|34}}
